attributes.action: End the "John Lewis List" for MPs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There can be no sensible or moral reason why MPS can claim from tax payer funds the money to pay for a list of household goods to furnish their homes. This is daylight robbery. In a time when the general population are getting squeezed by rising prices, house prices and taxes this is truly immoral. This beneift to MPs has to end.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
